Title: 41817 - # Reasons to Maintain a Relationship With an HVAC Repair Person
Direction: 500 words. Write three to six reasons that you should build a relationship with an HVAC repair technician or company. The HVAC systems in a home keep it comfortable, but they tend to break unexpectedly. Sometimes routine maintenance can't get past the fact a system is aging and needs more repair than usual. Maintaining a relationship with an HVAC technician or company can translate into better service when something breaks. Appeal to people in their 30s that have just purchased their first home and are settling into long-term ownership. Consider anchoring the URL to a sentence that discusses why a working relationship with an HVAC tech is a valuable one. Please make sure to link to this blog post as the target URL, not the client's homepage: http://www.calldougs.com/article/6-benefits-of-signing-up-for-a-home-maintenance-plan
